Package daypackage

Class Day

java.lang.Object
daypackage.Day
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDay, Serializable
public class Day extends Object implements Serializable, IDay
Day object class. Day object is serialisable and is composited in Showtime object
Since:
06-11-2022
